abstrac: Professional writer and author, native English speaker with Masters-level education
bio:
I have been writing for almost 15 years, including previously on Guru, although not again until recently. I have ghostwritten a number of books for other authors, as well as writing and publishing books under my own name. I have had academic research published.

I am experienced in writing various forms of international English - United Kingdom, Canadian, United States & Australian variations.

I particularly enjoy writing about finance, economics and banking, social issues, education, travel & religion. I play the piano and write music, and have had my own music released on streaming services as well as on CD.

When I am not writing for clients, I also work as lecturer in bookkeeping and accounting, as well as running my own coaching and learning business, and I live in the northwest of England near Liverpool.

PDFs attached here are my writing portfolio, and a sample chapter from a recently completed book on bookkeeping.

I work Monday to Friday but will also work weekends for specific jobs. Payment should be made swiftly upon receipt of the finished product. Please be as detailed as possible in your brief in order to help me create the best work for you.

abstrac: I help companies large and small achieve the outcomes they desire
bio:
Experienced Project Manager, Business Consultant, Business Analyst; from relatively new to mature organisations; across technology and business. Always interested in opportunities to increase my knowledge.

Having worked on large client projects at GAME, the Public Sector, ASDA, M&S and other major global and UK Retailers as well as an internationally renowned Utilities Company, I am now embarking on my freelancing career.

With experience of dealing with stakeholders at CEO and MD level, I am confident and personable whether presenting to the board or engaging one-to-one. With the ability to adapt style and content of presentation depending on the audience, I can be relied upon to be the business engagement lead for any programme of work.

I have seen the business benefits that a strong multi channel strategy can deliver. I am well versed in helping business leaders to build a vision for their organisation's offering. From bricks and mortar to mobile via kiosks and web, I ensure a blended approach that is customer centric. I am always keeping up to date with the latest advances in technologies and market trends, enabling me to talk frankly and with authority to business leaders.

I am a firm believer in ensuring that a project or programme is firmly rooted in the business change, processes, benefits and people that it aims to deliver. A coupling of my business acumen and ability to identify inefficiencies and solutionising allows me to maintain that grounding. Nevertheless, with a technical slant to some of my previous roles, I am able to hold software and infrastructure teams to account, whether they be part of the client, within my own organisation or third parties.

Project and Programme Management including Business Analysis and System Design across retail and financial services industries. Excellent Stakeholder Management, Presentation and Project Communication Skills.
I can align to any working hours, I am flexible on payment terms, and I am happy to communicate using whichever methods you prefer.

abstrac: Data analysis, Visualization and GIS mapping & Analysis
bio:
I have been offering consulting services in the field of Research & Data analytics and have total about 8 years of experience. I have led M & E portfolio in the most of the project. I am proficient in formulating statistically sound research design (tool design & validation, sampling & estimation/estimation method), followed by data processing, analysis & visualization. I have strong hold on analytical software like SPSS, R, Excel, QGIS. To name a few, Inferential statistics, modelling, spatial analysis, psychometry analysis.

I can help you with 
1) Data cleaning, merging, coding, wrangling - anything
2) Data analysis (R, SPSS, MS Excel)
    - Descriptive statistics
    - Complex cross-tabulation
    - Analysis of Multiple choice question
    - Correlation analysis
    - Inferential statistics (T, ANOVA, Chi-square)
    - General Linear models 
    - Linear and non-linear prediction models/ Regression analysis
    - Cluster analysis
    - Reliability analysis
    - Factor analysis
    - Structured equation modelling (SEM)
    - Item count theory, 
    - Rasch Modelling
    - Survival analysis
    - etc.

3) Data visualization (R, SPSS, MS Excel)
    - Bar/histograms
    - Line, line with CI
    - Scatter plot 
    - Desnity plots
    - Box/Errro plot
    - Maps
    - Mixed or customized plot as per requirement

4) GIS (QGIS) 
    - Georeferencing
    - Tracing
    - Lat long to Points
    - Distribution map based on a value/location
    - Hotspot/Density map
    - Spatial clustering (Moran's I, LISA)
    - Vector operations (non-exhaustive list)
    - Raster operations (non-exhaustive list)
    - Spatial analysis (autocorrelation, interpolation, extrapolation etc)
    - Etc.


You may also review my FIVERR Profile: https://www.fiverr.com/partht77?up_rollout=true
Can be discussed upon reviwing the period of engagement and efforts required

abstrac: MSc Strategic Management, BA English-Chinese Translation and BSc Event Management
bio:
I am a native Chinese speaker and an English to Chinese translator since 2012. 
I am able to provide accurate and fluent translations to suit the linguistic, cultural and technical requirements of the Chinese market.

I was a highly motivated and progress-focused fitness business owner and with a long-standing background in business incubation development in IT industry. Regarding my work experience, from 2010-2020, I have worked very hard for my goals. I ran a profitable gym from 2012 to Mar 2020. During the same period, I also had another two jobs, one was a Client Relationship Manager for a media company which involved Event Management and Business Development. The other job was as a freelance English-Chinese translator for local magazines.

I also have a master’s degree in Strategic Management with extensive knowledge of businesses. While completing the degree, I acquired the ability to conduct in-depth market research to use in the strategic planning process. My interest of study also includes evaluating company resources and current plans to determining what changes need to be made in order to make operations more efficient. I have a passion 
for learning different type of businesses, my goal of gaining a higher education in business is to forecast a company’s future by looking at its financial history, current situation and priorities and the current condition of the market. Using this information while taking into consideration the resources and manpower needed to operate efficiently, I hope to create a better and more effective policies and procedures, along with financial proposals that will encourage company growth.
Ads, banking, business/finance,education, wellness and fitness, food industry, IT (Information Security), journalism, legal (general), marketing, nutrition, profiles, travel & tourism, websites, etc.

abstrac: I specialize in writing about mortgages, credit and related regulated issues
bio: I began in the mortgage industry in 1992 and semi-retired in 2008. I work from home and set my own hours.

Itsalulu Writing .Com Pricing for 2022
                                          
                                                 Effective January 1, 2022


Effective Immediately: Due to the conflict in Ukraine, no work or proposals from the Russian Federation or Byelorussia will be accepted. This will continue until the conflict is resolved and the crisis is completed. 

There will be new pricing that goes into effect on January 1, 2022. I have made some changes to reflect the increase in costs of time and research. If you have any questions feel free to contact me. 
Current active clients will receive articles at the rate they are already paying!


1) For per article pricing:

                                        1000 words: $35.00
                                        1500 words: $40.00
 
Per article pricing over 1500 words can be negotiated. Individual article payment is due immediately upon receipt via Paypal. 
                                        

2) For recurring clients (a minimum of one article per week):

                                4 articles per month per article:        $35.00
                                8 articles per month per article:        $30.00
                               10 articles per month per article:       $25.00

Invoicing and billing take place on or about the first of the following month with payment due no later than the third business day via Paypal.
  
3) For large projects:

                               Pricing can be negotiated based on the individual client needs, budgetary requirements, and deadline(s). A minimum of 50% of the project will be due and payable to my Paypal account at itsalulu101361@gmail.com. The balance will be due and payable within 30 days of completion of the project. Late fees will be assessed every thirty (30) days at a rate of 10% of the balance due. All payments are made using Paypal.

abstrac: SENIOR FULL-STACK DEVELOPER ( PYTHON/DJANGO & REACT JS)
bio:
I am a full stack developer with Python/Django and React development skills. I have many years of experience in developing both client-side and server-side applications. I typically use a combination of Python/Django for back-end development and React for front-end development.  I am proficient in all aspects of software development and have a good understanding of the latest web technologies. I have a strong background in database management, web services, web development technologies, and version control systems. In addition, I can work quickly and efficiently on multiple projects.

I have served clients with businesses of all sizes, from individual proprietors to corporate entities. I utilize my tech stack to the fullest to provide the best and most modern development solutions available. I will never present you with a solution that is behind the times, incomplete, or less than perfect in quality.

BACKEND WEB DEVELOPMENT SKILLS

✅Proficiency in Python programming language and the Django web framework
✅Proficiency in Object-Relational Mapping (ORM) and how to use it to interact with databases
✅Proficiency in web development concepts such as HTTP, REST, and ✅HTML/CSS/JavaScript
✅Experience with version control systems such as Git
✅Familiarity with front-end technologies such as JavaScript, jQuery, and Bootstrap
✅Understanding of security best practices and how to prevent common web attacks
✅Experience with debugging, testing, and optimization techniques
✅Familiarity with Linux/Unix, Docker, and AWS
✅Knowledge of the CI/CD pipeline
✅Familiarity with Agile software development methodologies
✅Good communication and problem-solving skills.

FRONT-END WEB DEVELOPMENT SKILLS

✅Proficiency in JavaScript, asynchronous programming, closures, & ES6/7/8 features
✅Experience in React.js & its core principles (JSX, component lifecycle & state management)
✅Experience in popular React.js libraries and frameworks- Redux
